Description:
This steamy comic I created promotes an awesome dragon mouth fantasy toy for guys! First time trying something like this, and it was a blast to make. Hope you all enjoy the story and art!

If you're curious and want to grab the toy, use my affiliate code Battu for 15% off! it helps support both me and the creator. Thanks a ton!

https://dimvra.com/collections/all-product?bg_ref=McnkroIw3p
